tool_description: Detects and classifies the type of issue or request in customer feedback, distinguishing between complaints, compliments, suggestions, questions, and other issue types.

feedback_texts.description: Array of feedback texts to analyze for issue type

issue_types.description: List of possible issue types to classify feedback into

detection_sensitivity.description: Detection sensitivity level: low, medium, or high

prioritize_negative.description: Whether to prioritize detection of negative issue types like complaints

context_window.description: Number of words to consider for context analysis (10-200)

language_model.description: Language model for analysis: standard, advanced, or specialized

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text for issue type detection.
Invalid issue types: Provide at least two issue types for classification.
Unsupported sensitivity level: Use low, medium, or high for detection_sensitivity.
Invalid context window: Value must be between 10 and 200.
Unsupported language model: Use standard, advanced, or specialized.
Detection failed: Unable to detect issue types in one or more feedback texts.
usage: Provide feedback_texts and issue_types arrays. Configure detection_sensitivity, prioritize_negative, context_window, and language_model as needed. Returns issue type classifications.

detected_types.description: Primary issue type detected for each feedback

detection_confidence.description: Confidence score for each issue type detection

urgency_scores.description: Urgency score for each feedback based on issue type

mixed_type_indicators.description: Whether each feedback contains multiple issue types
